messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yeet Yeet Fam Ravioli, ur all a homosexuoli

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Cockmuffington Station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: I see unmaxed suit sensors and i anger

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: The booz-o-mat is in the fridge if the bar owner wants it back

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fitness Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You are all going to die.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Sounds cool to die. Now, who stole the captains ID? We can see the captain is dead due to his sensors...

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: That or he is the WORSE CAPTAIN OF ALL TIME!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Oh ok then. Thanks for that. We have now put a Pirate Officer on board

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Well good job! The best officer we had died....
